code: import redux,{createStore,applyMiddleware,combineReducers}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import userReducer from"./reducers/userReducer";import productReducer from"./reducers/productReducer";import cartReducer from"./reducers/cartReducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,product:productReducer,cart:cartReducer});var store=createStore(rootReducer,applyMiddleware(thunk));store.subscribe(function(){return console.warn;})("check store",store.getState());export default store;
